trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Concordia
There were no other sightings in Concordia on or around August 25th 1997
Summary: A bumarang shape of lights zooming across the ski then appearing as a triangle then dissapearing
divs: Sighting DetailsI was around 16 or 17 yrs old with several friends and we seen a boomarang shape object circle in the ski. We all say did you see that. "I saw it, so what did you see." Confirmed image of what I saw threw 5 others. Started talking about what we saw and it appeared again as a boomarang circleing the ski and form into a triangle and dissappeared. I suppose the triangle shape was from the back of the aircraft accelerating away. This instance was over 12 years ago and there are several wittnesses.
